model

Class Moveable

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.WorldObject
        • model.Moveable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Edible, Floater, SnakePart

    public class Moveable
extends WorldObject
implements java.io.Serializable
    Moveable class represents a generic floating object in space with mass which also is collidable with other Moveable objets.
    Version:
    1.0.0.0
    Author:
    Model-team
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
